questions.question_text:
You need to configure the system to handle all ticket sales.
What should you configure?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
There is a bulk purchase discount on the tickets. Pretty straight forward, so I think it is A.

Selected Answer: A
It is A. Opportunities that are lost must include the reasons other show and not interested.
Whenever, there is a lost, we must put other show's name for tracking competitor.

Selected Answer: A
"Other shows" means what other theatres are doing; best place to record this is Competitors

comments.content:
It's about the shows of other theatres:
"Representatives must track which shows customers go to when they do not purchase the tickets to their shows. This information must be entered in the records.
Every time a potential large sale is lost, the representative needs to ask the customer which show ticket was purchased instead of their show."
And these entries are best to put in competitors, s. also: https://neilparkhurst.com/2019/07/07/mb-210-microsoft-dynamics-365-for-sales-competitors/
I got caught by this question too: "Other Shows" is a reference to competitors, so A it is.

discussion.content: why not product? competitor does not make sence

questions.question_text:
You need to choose where to enter the other show names in the system.
Where should you add the shows?
